text: Craig Ferguson (born 17 May 1962) is an Scottish actor, comedian and late night television host. He hosted The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson from 2005-2014 on CBS while James Corden takes over. He also hosted Shark Week in 2010 on the Discovery Channel. He became an American citizen on 1 February 2008. He hosted Celebrity Name Game on Syndication from 2014-2017. He hosted Join or Die with Craig Ferguson on History in 2016. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:British television talk show hosts Category:Entertainers from Glasgow Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Scottish comedians Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Television personalities from Glasgow
title: Craig Ferguson
